mapper.insert: insert into zt_car_event_${month} ( event_type, event_serialid, dev_phone, gps_pos_x, gps_pos_y, gps_speed, gps_height, gps_direct, gps_valid, box_up, box_empty, box_close, car_number, car_passport, car_state, car_weigui, driver_id, send_datetime, revice_datetime, online_state ) values ( '${eventInfo.eventType}', '${eventInfo.eventSerialId}', '${locationInfo.devPhone}', '${locationInfo.gpsPosX}', '${locationInfo.gpsPosY}', '${locationInfo.gpsSpeed}', '${locationInfo.gpsHeight}', '${locationInfo.gpsDirect}', '1', '${locationInfo.boxUp}', '${locationInfo.boxEmpty}', '${locationInfo.boxClose}', '${locationInfo.carNumber}', '${locationInfo.workPassport}', '${locationInfo.carState}', '${locationInfo.carWeigui}', '${locationInfo.driverId}', '${locationInfo.sendDatetime}', now(), '1' )
